wp25EasterEggs-desc: A short description of the extension.
wp25eastereggs-enable-name: Label for the Birthday mode feature toggle in the Appearance menu and Settings page. Includes a party emoji (ðŸŽ‰).
wp25eastereggs-enable-label: Label for the Birthday mode feature toggle in the Appearance Preferences page on both desktop and mobile interfaces. Includes a party emoji (ðŸŽ‰).
wp25eastereggs-enable-description: Description explaining the Birthday mode feature, shown in the mobile Settings page.
wp25eastereggs-enable-help: Help text explaining the Birthday mode feature, shown in the Appearance Preferences page on both desktop and mobile interfaces.
wp25eastereggs-enable-0-label: Label for the option to disable the Birthday mode feature.
wp25eastereggs-enable-1-label: Label for the option to enable the Birthday mode feature.
wp25eastereggs-enable-learn-more-link-la: Label for the link in the Appearance Preferences page leading to more information about the Birthday mode.
wp25eastereggs-enable-learn-more-link-ur: URL for the link in the Appearance Preferences page leading to more information about the Birthday mode.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-ti: Title of the WP25EasterEggs section in Community Configuration.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-de: Description of the WP25EasterEggs extension configuration section in Community Configuration.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-ad: Additional description text for the configuration header, appearing after the main description.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-en: Label for the option to enable or disable the WP25EasterEggs extension globally.
Description for the extension enable/disable option.
Label for the option to disable the extension.
Label for the option to enable the extension.
Label for the global filter type setting that controls where companion Easter eggs appear.

Label for the option to display companion Easter eggs on all pages.
